title: Ecommerce Product Lister & Visual Content Specialist (Shopify)
job_overview:
We’re looking for a detail-oriented and creative Shopify Product Lister to help grow our Google Store with high-quality product listings. This is a remote freelance role with flexible hours and attractive bonus opportunities for consistent performance.

?

Responsibilities:
 • Upload and optimize new products in our Shopify store
 • Write conversion-focused product copy using ChatGPT (in english and dutch)
 • Generate high-quality AI product images with Sora.ai
 • Design HD transparent PNG variant images (1000x1000px) in Canva
 • Create high quality HD gifs (1000x1000px)
 • Set up collections and tags for the product
 • Localize and translate product listings using Shopify’s Translate & Adapt app

?

Requirements:
 • At least 2+ years of experience working with Shopify
 • Experience with product listings, variants
 • Confident using ChatGPT, Sora.ai, and Canva
 • Strong attention to detail and an eye for visual quality
 • Ability to create visuals in a Japandi-style
 • Familiarity with translate&adapt and judgeme app in Shopify

?

Offer:
Payment: $3 per approved product listing
? Personal Bonus: +$0.50 when you personally average 2 listings per day (calculated monthly)
? Personal Bonus: +$1 when you personally average 3 listings per day (calculated monthly)
? Additional Team Bonus: if the team’s average draft time per product stays below 2 days
